summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3253, for the improvement of East Marion Street, from 11th Avenue to 13th Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40327 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
